# FurniDeco

![FurniDeco Key Art](https://arexon.dev/pages/furnideco/thumbnail.png)

![Download FurniDeco](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?style=for-the-badge&label=&message=Download&color=d07a5b&labelColor=752447&link=https://arexon.dev/project/furnideco&logo=data:image/png;base64,)
![Latest Version](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/Arexon/furnideco?style=for-the-badge&label=version&labelColor=752447&color=d07a5b)
![License](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?style=for-the-badge&label=license&message=Apache%202.0&labelColor=752447&color=d07a5b&link)

FurniDeco adds 25 pieces of functional, decorative and unique-looking furniture that fit with the vanilla style. With more than 80 variants in total, FurniDeco gives you endless options to furniture & decorate your builds!

<hr/>

## Features

- üí∫ 25 Unique pieces of furniture & decorations, up to 80+ variants

- üéÆ Interactive and functional
- üç¶ Fits with the Minecraft Vanilla feel
- ü™ì Craftable in survival mode
- üßä Uses blocks
